name: classify_aki_stage_kdigo
description: Classify AKI stage per KDIGO criteria using baseline and current creatinine values. Returns stage (0-3), criteria met, creatinine ratio, and absolute change.

baseline_cr.description: Baseline creatinine in mg/dL (lowest in past 7 days or admission value)

cr_change_48h.description: Change in creatinine over 48 hours in mg/dL (optional)

returns.criteria_met: string describing which KDIGO criteria are met
